AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: IC_Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: value = 'IC'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_BenTypeList_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ( (@Escm_IsCustody_Transfer@='Y' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('S','D','E')) or (@EM_Escm_Receivingtype@='IRT' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('S','D','E')) or (@EM_Escm_Receivingtype@='LD' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('S','D','E')) or (@EM_Escm_Receivingtype@='INR' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('S','D','E','MA')) or (@MaterialIssueRequest@='MIR' and AD_Ref_List.AD_Ref_List_id in (select ad_ref_list_id from eut_list_access where ad_role_id =@AD_Role_Id@ and isactive='Y' and ad_window_id='D8BA0A87790B4B67A86A8DF714525736') and (case when 'Y'=(select case when em_escm_warehouse_type='MAW' then 'Y' else 'N' end as ismainwrh from m_warehouse where m_warehouse_id=@M_Warehouse_ID@) then AD_Ref_List.Value not in ('GD','MA','OHLD', 'SA') else AD_Ref_List.Value not in ('NMSD') end )) or (@SiteMaterialIssueRequest@='Y' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('S','D','E')) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_PRDept
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: em_ehcm_orgtyp in (select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value='DEPT') and ad_org_id in(select requestingdep from escm_bidsourceref srcref join escm_bidmgmt_line ln on srcref.escm_bidmgmt_line_id=ln.escm_bidmgmt_line_id join escm_bidmgmt bid on ln.escm_bidmgmt_id=bid.escm_bidmgmt_id where bid.escm_bidmgmt_id=@Escm_bidmgmt_id@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_ProposalEval_Bid_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Escm_Bidmgmt_ID not in ( select Escm_Bidmgmt_ID from escm_proposalevl_event where ( Escm_Bidmgmt_ID is not null AND ESCM_ProposalEvl_Event_ID <> @ESCM_ProposalEvl_Event_ID@) OR ( Escm_Bidmgmt_ID is not null AND @ESCM_ProposalEvl_Event_ID@ is null )) AND (escm_bidmgmt_id in ( select escm_bidmgmt_id from escm_proposalmgmt where proposalstatus<>'DR' and bidtype='DR') or( escm_bidmgmt_id in ( select escm_bidmgmt_id from escm_openenvcommitee where status='CO' and bidtype<>'DR' ) )) and (case when (bidtype='LD' or bidtype='TR') then Escm_Bidmgmt_ID in ( select Escm_Bidmgmt_ID from escm_technicalevl_event where status='CO' ) else 1=1 end)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: OrgList without *
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_orgtype_id <>'0' and em_ehcm_orgtyp in (select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value ='ORG')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_ProposalStatus_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((@ESCM_ProposalStatus@<>'CL' and @ESCM_ProposalStatus@<>'AWD' and AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('SHO','DIS')) or (@ESCM_ProposalStatus@='CL' and AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('CL')) or (@ESCM_ProposalStatus@='AWD' and AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('AWD')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Return Transaction ( org Val)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: em_ehcm_orgtyp in (select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value='ORG')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_Bid_Catg
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='BD_CTG' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_Substitute_Item
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: M_Product.M_Product_ID in ( select t1.m_product_id from m_product t1 join escm_deflookups_typeln t2 on t2.escm_deflookups_typeln_id=t1.em_escm_stock_type where t2.value='CUS' and t1.isstocked='Y' and t1.ispurchased='Y' and t1.M_Product_Category_ID=@M_Product_Category_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Currency without SAR
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: iso_code!='SAR'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_RegionBasedOnCountry
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_country_id = @C_Country_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Second IBan Listing in PO
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_bpartner_id = @EM_Escm_Secondsupplier@ and Iban is not null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_Organization(Transaction only)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Escm_Org_V_ID in (SELECT ad_org.ad_org_id FROM ad_org join ad_orgtype on ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id=ad_org.ad_orgtype_id where ad_orgtype.IsTransactionsAllowed='Y' and ad_org.em_ehcm_orgtyp in ( select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value='ORG')) and IsReady='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Project execution Address
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='CBDA' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Announcemnt Number
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_bidmgmt_id = @Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Bid Terms And Condition
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='BTC' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_PurchaseAgreementVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Order_ID in (select ord.C_Order_id from C_Order ord where ord.EM_Escm_Ordertype='PUR_AG' and ord.EM_Escm_Appstatus='ESCM_AP' and ord.C_Order_id in (select line.C_Order_id from C_OrderLine line where line.C_Order_id=ord.C_Order_id and case When ord.EM_Escm_Receivetype='QTY' then (line.QtyOrdered - line.EM_Escm_Releaseqty)>0 else (line.linenetamt - line.em_escm_releaseamt)>0 end)and ord.c_order_id not in (select EM_Escm_Old_Order from C_Order ord where EM_Escm_Old_Order is not null))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Purchase Order supplier
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: isvendor='Y' and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Employee Val(Proposal Evaluation Event)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner.isEmployee='Y' and C_BPartner.isactive='Y' and C_BPartner.c_bpartner_id in ( select mem.c_bpartner_id from escm_committee_members mem where escm_committee_id=@ESCM_Committee_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_OrderLine_TreeVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_orderline_v.c_order_id = @C_Order_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_MIR_IssueReason
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: MIR Issue Reason based on Beneficiary Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((@Beneficiary_Type@='D' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('ID')) or (@Beneficiary_Type@='E' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('IE')) or (@Beneficiary_Type@='GD' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('REW')) or (@Beneficiary_Type@='OHLD' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('LD')) or (@Beneficiary_Type@='S' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('ISS')) or (@Beneficiary_Type@='MA' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('MA')) or (@Beneficiary_Type@='SA' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('S')) or (@Beneficiary_Type@='OB' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('OB')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Beneficiary(With Type)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@beneficiary_type@='S' and Escm_Beneficiary_V.btype=@beneficiary_type@ and ( Escm_Beneficiary_V.ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@) and Escm_Beneficiary_V.ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@ ) or (@beneficiary_type@='D' and Escm_Beneficiary_V.btype=@beneficiary_type@ and Escm_Beneficiary_V.ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@ ) or ( @beneficiary_type@='E' and Escm_Beneficiary_V.btype=@beneficiary_type@ and Escm_Beneficiary_V.ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@ and ( @ESCM_WarehouseKeeper@ = 'Y' or Escm_Beneficiary_V.escm_beneficiary_v_id in( select c_bpartner_id from c_bpartner where em_ehcm_parent_org in ( ( select coalesce(em_ehcm_parent_org ,'0') from ad_user u join c_bpartner bp on bp.c_bpartner_id = u.c_bpartner_id where ad_user_id =@AD_User_ID@))) ))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: RFP Supplernumber
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (case when (( select count(suppliernumber) from escm_bidsuppliers where escm_bidsuppliers.escm_bidmgmt_id = @escm_bidmgmt_id@ ) = 0) then (C_BPartner_id in (select C_BPartner_id from C_BPartner where em_efin_blacklist = 'N' and Vendor_Blocking = 'N' and isvendor='Y' and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@ and (EM_Efin_Documentno<>'' or EM_Efin_Documentno is not null) )) else ( C_BPartner_id in (select suppliernumber from escm_bidsuppliers where escm_bidsuppliers.escm_bidmgmt_id = @escm_bidmgmt_id@ )) end)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Committee Recommendation Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='CRT' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_BG_Supplier_val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: em_efin_blacklist = 'N' and Vendor_BlocKing = 'N' and isvendor='Y' and (EM_Efin_Documentno<>'' or EM_Efin_Documentno is not null) and ((@Document_No@ is not null and ( c_bpartner_id in (select c_bpartner_id from escm_bg_documentno_v where escm_bg_documentno_v_id = @Document_No@ ))) or ( @Document_No@ is null and 1=1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Business Partner Supplier Activity
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='SA' and isactive ='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_Businesspartner_Employee
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: isemployee='Y' and isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_RequisitionLine_parent
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_requisitionline_v.m_requisition_id=@M_Requisition_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_BeneficiaryDept
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Escm_Beneficiary_V.btype='D' and Escm_Beneficiary_V.ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: PR Document Process Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value in ('TR','LD')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Transaction date validation BG
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_year_id in (select y.c_year_id from c_period p join c_year y on y.c_year_id = p.c_year_id where eut_convertto_gregorian(split_part(@Transaction_Date@ ,'-',3 )||split_part(@Transaction_Date@ ,'-',2 )||split_part(@Transaction_Date@,'-',1) )::date between p.startdate and p.enddate and p.ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_PRMaintenance_Prj_Lookup
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_deflookups_type_id in (select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='PL' and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_PurReq_Dept_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: em_ehcm_orgtyp is not null and em_ehcm_orgtyp in (select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value not in ('CLIENT','ORG', 'CL')) and ad_org_id in (select ad_org_id from ad_org where value in ( select EM_Ehcm_Department_Code from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id in (select c_bpartner_id from ad_user where ad_user_id = @#AD_User_ID@))) and ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Custody transfer signature(line manager emp)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID <> @EM_Escm_Ctsenderemp@ and C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID <> @EM_Escm_Ctreceiveremp@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Pur contract proposal no
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_proposalmgmt.supplier=@C_Bpartner_ID@ and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Onlinemedia
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='OLA' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Order_City_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_city_id IN (select c_city_id from c_city where c_region_id =@EUT_C_Region_ID@ AND @EUT_C_Region_ID@ is not null) or ((@EUT_C_Region_ID@ IS null) OR (@EUT_C_Region_ID@ ='')) and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_BPartner(Client)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner.AD_Client_ID=@AD_Client_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Product_Contract_Category
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ESCM_DefLookups_TypeLn_id in ( select a.ESCM_DefLookups_TypeLn_id from ESCM_DefLookups_TypeLn a join ESCM_DefLookups_Type b on a.ESCM_DefLookups_Type_id=b.ESCM_DefLookups_Type_id and b.reference='POCONCATG' and a.ESCM_DefLookups_TypeLn_id not in (select c.Contractcategory from ESCM_PROD_CONT_CATG c where c.M_Product_id=@M_Product_ID@ ) ) or ESCM_DefLookups_TypeLn_id in (select d.Contractcategory from ESCM_PROD_CONT_CATG d where ESCM_PROD_CONT_CATG_id=@ESCM_PROD_CONT_CATG_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Title Name(Lookup)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='TN' and isactive ='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_Role_ProcessType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.AD_Ref_List_id in (select ad_ref_list_id from eut_list_access where ad_role_id =@AD_Role_Id@ and isactive='Y' and ad_window_id='800092')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Child Organization in Shipment att
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id in (select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_getchildorglist(@#AD_Client_ID@,@AD_Org_ID@) ,','):: character varying [] ) ,'''','')) and em_ehcm_orgtyp in ( select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value='ORG')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Proposal Submittion Address
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='CBDA' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: PO Open/Close Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @EM_Escm_Appstatus@ ='ESCM_AP' then AD_Ref_List.value ='CL' when @EM_Escm_Appstatus@='ESCM_CL' then AD_Ref_List.value ='OP' else AD_Ref_List.value in ('OP','CL') end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_Organization
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id='0' or em_ehcm_orgtyp in ( select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value='ORG')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_IC_Supplier_val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: em_efin_blacklist = 'N' and Vendor_BlocKing = 'N' and isvendor='Y' and (EM_Efin_Documentno<>'' or EM_Efin_Documentno is not null) and ((@C_Order_ID@ is not null and ( c_bpartner_id in (select c_bpartner_id from c_order where c_order_id = @C_Order_ID@ ))) or ( @C_Order_ID@ is null and 1=1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_Warehouse(with Return)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: M_Warehouse_ID in (select M_Warehouse_ID from m_warehouse where em_escm_warehouse_type in ('MAW','RTW') and ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_Master_Categor(Issummary)
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Master Category Checked With Summary level
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: M_Product_Category.M_Product_Category_ID in (select M_Product_Category_ID from M_Product_Category where Issummary='Y' ) and M_Product_Category.M_Product_Category_ID not in ( select M_Product_Category_ID from M_Product_Category where M_Product_Category_ID = @M_Product_Category_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Transaction_Org(With *)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ad_orgtype WHERE ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id=ad_org.ad_orgtype_id AND IsTransactionsAllowed='Y') and IsReady='Y' and em_ehcm_orgtyp in ( select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value='ORG')) or ad_org_id='0'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Lookup Org(Val)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ad_orgtype WHERE ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id=ad_org.ad_orgtype_id AND IsTransactionsAllowed='Y') and IsReady='Y' and em_ehcm_orgtyp in ( select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value='ORG')) or ad_org_id='0'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_Bg_Role_ContactName
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID in(select usr.c_bpartner_id from ad_preference pr join ad_user usr on usr.ad_user_id = pr.ad_user_id where property = 'ESCM_BGSpecialist_Role' and value='Y' and pr.ad_user_id is not null) OR C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID in( select usr.c_bpartner_id from ad_preference pre join ad_user_roles rl on rl.ad_role_id = pre.visibleat_role_id join ad_user usr on usr.ad_user_id = rl.ad_user_id where property = 'ESCM_BGSpecialist_Role' and value='Y' and pre.ad_user_id is null and pre.visibleat_role_id is not null) OR C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID in (select c_bpartner_id from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id in ( select c_bpartner_id from ad_user where ad_user_id =@#AD_User_ID@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCm_IC_Bid_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: bidstatus = 'ACT' and ((@C_Order_ID@ is not null and( Escm_Bidmgmt_ID in ( select em_escm_bidmgmt_id from C_Order where C_Order_ID= @C_Order_ID@ ))) or (@C_Order_ID@ is null and 1=1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_Bid_ChangeStatus
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((@Bidstatus@='ACT' and value not in ('ACT','DR','IP','EXT','IA')) or (@Bidstatus@='EXT' and value not in ('ACT','DR','IP','EXT','IA')) or (@Bidstatus@='PP' and value not in ('ACT','DR','IP','EXT','IA','PP')) or (@Bidstatus@='WD' and value not in ('ACT','DR','IP','EXT','IA','PP','WD')) or (@Bidstatus@='RES' and value not in ('ACT','DR','IP','EXT','IA','RES')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: IC_Type_PO/C
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: value = 'PO/C'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_ProductCategory(Leaf with Master)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Issummary='N' and em_escm_product_category is not null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_ReqContractCategoryLookUp
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (case when (select count(reqln.M_RequisitionLine_id) from M_RequisitionLine reqln where reqln.M_Requisition_id=@M_Requisition_ID@ and reqln.m_product_id is not null)>0 then (escm_deflookups_typeln_id in (select pcontctg.contractcategory from M_RequisitionLine reqln left join m_product prod on prod.m_product_id=reqln.m_product_id left join escm_prod_cont_catg pcontctg on prod.m_product_id=pcontctg.m_product_id where reqln.M_Requisition_id=@M_Requisition_ID@ and pcontctg.isactive='Y' and pcontctg.contractcategory is not null) ) else (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='POCONCATG' and isactive='Y')) end) and (case when (select count(ad_user_id) from eut_user_lookup_access where ad_user_id=@AD_User_Id@)> 0 then escm_deflookups_typeln_id in (select escm_deflookups_typeln_id from eut_user_lookup_access where ad_user_id=@AD_User_Id@ and isactive='Y') else escm_deflookups_typeln_id in (select escm_deflookups_typeln_id from eut_lookup_access where ad_role_id= @AD_Role_Id@ and isactive='Y') end)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Proposal_BranchName
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@Supplier@ is not null and c_bpartner_location.c_bpartner_id = @Supplier@ and ((c_bpartner_location_id in (select branchname from escm_bidsuppliers where escm_bidmgmt_id =@Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@ and suppliernumber =@Supplier@ )) or ((((select count(escm_salesvoucher_id) from escm_salesvoucher where escm_bidmgmt_id =@Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@)=0 and c_bpartner_location.c_bpartner_id = @Supplier@) or ((select count(escm_salesvoucher_id) from escm_salesvoucher where escm_bidmgmt_id =@Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@)>0 and (c_bpartner_location_id in (select branchname from escm_salesvoucher where escm_bidmgmt_id =@Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@ and suppliernumber =@Supplier@ )))) and @Bidtype@='TR'))) or ( @Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@ is null and @Supplier@ is not null and c_bpartner_location.c_bpartner_id = @Supplier@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_OrgBasedDept
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_salesregion_id in (select c_salesregion_id from c_salesregion where isdefault='N' and ad_org_id in(select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_getchildorglist(@#AD_Client_ID@,@AD_Org_ID@) ,',')::character varying [] ) ,'''','')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_POContractCategoryLookUp
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (case when (select count(ordln.c_orderline_id) from c_orderline ordln where ordln.c_order_id=@C_Order_Id@ and ordln.m_product_id is not null)>0 then (escm_deflookups_typeln_id in (select pcontctg.contractcategory from c_orderline ordln left join m_product prod on prod.m_product_id=ordln.m_product_id left join escm_prod_cont_catg pcontctg on prod.m_product_id=pcontctg.m_product_id where ordln.c_order_id=@C_Order_Id@ and pcontctg.isactive='Y' and pcontctg.contractcategory is not null) ) else (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='POCONCATG' and isactive='Y')) end ) and (case when (select count(ad_user_id) from eut_user_lookup_access where ad_user_id=@AD_User_Id@)> 0 then escm_deflookups_typeln_id in (select escm_deflookups_typeln_id from eut_user_lookup_access where ad_user_id=@AD_User_Id@ and isactive='Y') else escm_deflookups_typeln_id in (select escm_deflookups_typeln_id from eut_lookup_access where ad_role_id= @AD_Role_Id@ and isactive='Y') end)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_BG_Category_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='BGC' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Product Stock Type (Val)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='PST' and isactive ='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Announcement val(Proposal Evaluation Event)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_annoucements.escm_annoucements_id in ( select escm_annoucements_id from escm_annousummarybid where escm_bidmgmt_id= @Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@) and escm_annoucements.status='CO'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Lookup(Ref Val)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Reference.AD_Reference_ID in ('B20EC150092540609309244056454EE2')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Transaction date validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_year_id in (select y.c_year_id from c_period p join c_year y on y.c_year_id = p.c_year_id where eut_convertto_gregorian(split_part(@EM_Escm_Transaction_Date@ ,'-',3 )||split_part(@EM_Escm_Transaction_Date@ ,'-',2 )||split_part(@EM_Escm_Transaction_Date@,'-',1) )::date between p.startdate and p.enddate and p.ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_POAmendmentAction
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: value in ('ED', 'RD', 'IA', 'RA')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_BidContractCategoryLookUp
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when (select count(bidln.escm_bidmgmt_line_id) from escm_bidmgmt_line bidln where bidln.escm_bidmgmt_id=@ESCM_Bidmgmt_ID@ and bidln.m_product_id is not null)>0 then (escm_deflookups_typeln_id in (select pcontctg.contractcategory from escm_bidmgmt_line bidln left join m_product prod on prod.m_product_id=bidln.m_product_id left join escm_prod_cont_catg pcontctg on prod.m_product_id=pcontctg.m_product_id where bidln.escm_bidmgmt_id=@ESCM_Bidmgmt_ID@ and pcontctg.isactive='Y' and pcontctg.contractcategory is not null)) else (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='POCONCATG' and isactive='Y')) end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_ReceiveType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference = 'RT' and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: IBan Listing in Proposal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_bpartner_id = @Secondsupplier@ and Iban is not null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_Org_Location_val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_location.c_location_id in (select c_location_id from AD_OrgInfo where ad_org_id= @AD_Org_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_LnPOChangeTypeLookUp
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='POCHGTYP' and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_DocumentNo_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ESCM_BG_Documentno_V.type=@Document_Type@ and(( ( ESCM_BG_Documentno_V.type='P' and (ESCM_BG_Documentno_V.Status not in ('AWD','CL','WD','DIS')) ) or (ESCM_BG_Documentno_V.type='POC' and ( ESCM_BG_Documentno_V.Status in ('CO','DR')) )) and ESCM_BG_Documentno_V.ESCM_BG_Documentno_V_id not in ( select document_no from escm_bgworkbench where document_no is not null ) or(ESCM_BG_Documentno_V.ESCM_BG_Documentno_V_id =@Document_No@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_BGVendor_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: @C_Bpartner_ID@ is not null and c_bpartner_location.c_bpartner_id = @C_Bpartner_ID@ or (( c_bpartner_location.c_bpartner_location_id = ( select branchname from escm_proposalmgmt where escm_proposalmgmt_id=@Document_No@)) or( c_bpartner_location.c_bpartner_location_id = ( select c_bpartner_location_id from c_order where c_order_id=@Document_No@) ))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Committee(Technical Event)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: type='TC' AND status='CO'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Custody transfer signature(receiver emp)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID <> @EM_Escm_Ctsenderemp@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_BGType_Val(BGW)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((@Document_Type@='P' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('IBG')) or (@Document_Type@='POC' and AD_Ref_List.Value in ('FBG', 'DPG', 'PMG')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Location Address
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: @Suppliernumber@ is not null and c_bpartner_location.c_bpartner_id = @Suppliernumber@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Bid status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: bidstatus = 'ACT'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ToBeneficiary
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@EM_Escm_Tobeneficiary@='S' and Escm_Beneficiary_V.btype=@EM_Escm_Tobeneficiary@ and ( Escm_Beneficiary_V.ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@) and Escm_Beneficiary_V.Escm_Beneficiary_V_ID <> @EM_Escm_Bname@) or(@EM_Escm_Tobeneficiary@='D' and Escm_Beneficiary_V.btype=@EM_Escm_Tobeneficiary@ and Escm_Beneficiary_V.Escm_Beneficiary_V_ID <> @EM_Escm_Bname@ ) or (@EM_Escm_Tobeneficiary@='E' and Escm_Beneficiary_V.btype=@EM_Escm_Tobeneficiary@ and ( Escm_Beneficiary_V.ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@) and Escm_Beneficiary_V.Escm_Beneficiary_V_ID <> @EM_Escm_Bname@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Organization(Without *)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (case when (select ad_org_id from m_product where m_product_id = @M_Product_ID@) = '0' then em_ehcm_orgtyp in (select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value ='ORG') and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@ else ad_org_id in(select replace(unnest(string_to_array(eut_getparentorglist(@#AD_Client_ID@,(select ad_org_id from m_product where m_product_id = @M_Product_ID@)) ,',')::character varying [] ) ,'''',''))end )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Custody transfer signature(receiveline manager)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @EM_Escm_Ctsender@ is not null then AD_User_ID <> @EM_Escm_Ctsender@ else 1=1 end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_BidType_BasedOnRole
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.AD_Ref_List_id in (select ad_ref_list_id from eut_list_access where ad_role_id =@AD_Role_Id@ and isactive='Y' and ad_window_id='E509200618424FD099BAB1D4B34F96B8')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_POMaintenance_Prj_Lookup
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (case when (select count(distinct m_requisition.em_escm_maintenance_project) from c_order join c_orderline using (c_order_id) join Escm_Ordersource_Ref using (c_orderline_id) join m_requisition using (m_requisition_id) where c_order.c_order_id=@C_Order_Id@) > 0 then (escm_deflookups_typeln_id in (select distinct m_requisition.em_escm_maintenance_project from c_order join c_orderline using (c_order_id) join Escm_Ordersource_Ref using (c_orderline_id) join m_requisition using (m_requisition_id) where c_order.c_order_id=@C_Order_Id@)) when @EM_Escm_Proposalmgmt_ID@ is not null and (select count(distinct m_requisition.em_escm_maintenance_project) from c_order join escm_proposalmgmt prp on prp.escm_proposalmgmt_id=c_order.em_escm_proposalmgmt_id join escm_proposalmgmt_line using (escm_proposalmgmt_id) join c_orderline ordln on ordln.em_escm_proposalmgmt_line_id=escm_proposalmgmt_line.escm_proposalmgmt_line_id join escm_proposalsource_ref using (escm_proposalmgmt_line_id) join m_requisition using (m_requisition_id) where c_order.c_order_id =@C_Order_Id@) > 0 then (escm_deflookups_typeln_id in (select distinct m_requisition.em_escm_maintenance_project from c_order join escm_proposalmgmt prp on prp.escm_proposalmgmt_id=c_order.em_escm_proposalmgmt_id join escm_proposalmgmt_line using (escm_proposalmgmt_id) join c_orderline ordln on ordln.em_escm_proposalmgmt_line_id=escm_proposalmgmt_line.escm_proposalmgmt_line_id join escm_proposalsource_ref using (escm_proposalmgmt_line_id) join m_requisition using (m_requisition_id) where c_order.c_order_id =@C_Order_Id@)) when @EM_Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@ is not null and (select count(distinct m_requisition.em_escm_maintenance_project) from c_order join escm_bidmgmt bid on bid.escm_bidmgmt_id=c_order.em_escm_bidmgmt_id join escm_bidmgmt_line using (escm_bidmgmt_id) join escm_bidsourceref using (escm_bidmgmt_line_id) join m_requisition using (m_requisition_id) where c_order.c_order_id =@C_Order_Id@) > 0 then (escm_deflookups_typeln_id in (select distinct m_requisition.em_escm_maintenance_project from c_order join escm_bidmgmt bid on bid.escm_bidmgmt_id=c_order.em_escm_bidmgmt_id join escm_bidmgmt_line using (escm_bidmgmt_id) join escm_bidsourceref using (escm_bidmgmt_line_id) join m_requisition using (m_requisition_id) where c_order.c_order_id =@C_Order_Id@)) else (escm_deflookups_type_id in (select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='PL' and isactive='Y')) end)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM AD_Org is transactions allowed
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ad_orgtype WHERE ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id=ad_org.ad_orgtype_id AND IsTransactionsAllowed='Y') and IsReady='Y' and em_ehcm_orgtyp in ( select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value='ORG')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_OrgDepartment_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: em_ehcm_orgtyp in (select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value='DEPT')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Multiple Issuance Warehouse
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: M_Warehouse_ID in (select M_Warehouse_ID from m_warehouse where em_escm_warehouse_type in ('MAW','RTW') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Po Mandatory Lookup
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Field.AD_Field_id in (select ad_field_id from ad_field field join ad_column columns on columns.ad_column_id = field.ad_column_id where ad_tab_id='62248BBBCF644C18A75B92AD8E50238C' and isreadonly='N' and isdisplayed='Y' and ismandatory='N' and ad_reference_id!='28')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Bid Validation(Technical Event)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((Escm_Bidmgmt_ID not in ( select Escm_Bidmgmt_ID from escm_technicalevl_event where Escm_Bidmgmt_ID is not null )) and (Escm_Bidmgmt_ID not in ( select Escm_Bidmgmt_ID from escm_proposalevl_event where Escm_Bidmgmt_ID is not null )) and (Escm_Bidmgmt_ID in ( select Escm_Bidmgmt_ID from escm_openenvcommitee where status='CO')) or (Escm_Bidmgmt_ID = @Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@)) and bidtype in ('TR','LD')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: order city validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE:
((((select count(ad_user_id) from EUT_User_Regandcity_Access where ad_user_id=@#AD_User_ID@)>0) and (c_city_id IN (select c_city_id from EUT_User_Regandcity_Access where ad_user_id=@#AD_User_ID@ and c_city_id is not null ) or c_city_id IN (select c_city_id from c_city where c_region_id in ( select c_region_id from EUT_User_Regandcity_Access where ad_user_id=@#AD_User_ID@ and c_city_id is null ) )))
or(((select count(ad_user_id) from EUT_User_Regandcity_Access where ad_user_id=@#AD_User_ID@)=0) and (c_city_id IN (select eut_c_city_id from eut_regandcity_access where ad_role_id=@#AD_Role_ID@ and eut_c_city_id is not null ) or c_city_id IN (select c_city_id from c_city where c_region_id in ( select eut_c_region_id from eut_regandcity_access where ad_role_id=@#AD_Role_ID@ and eut_c_city_id is null ) ))))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_TotPOChangeFactLookUp
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='POCHGFACT' and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCm_BG_Bid_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: bidstatus = 'ACT' and (( bidtype in ('TR','LD' ) and escm_bidmgmt_id in (select escm_bidmgmt_id from escm_openenvcommitee)) or ( bidtype in ('DR' ) and 1=1)) and ((@Document_No@ is not null and( Escm_Bidmgmt_ID in ( select Escm_Bidmgmt_ID from escm_bg_documentno_v where escm_bg_documentno_v_id= @Document_No@ ))) or (@Document_No@ is null and 1=1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_Inventoy_Warehouse
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: em_escm_warehouse_type = 'MAW' or em_escm_warehouse_type = 'RTW'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Commitee validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (select eut_convertto_gregorian(split_part(@todaydate@,'-' ,3 )||split_part(@todaydate@,'-' ,2 )||split_part(@todaydate@,'-' ,1 ) ) >= escm_committee.startdate) and (select eut_convertto_gregorian(split_part(@todaydate@,'-' ,3 )||split_part(@todaydate@,'-' ,2 )||split_part(@todaydate@,'-' ,1 ) ) <= escm_committee.enddate) and type = 'OEC' and status = 'CO' and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: PUR Contract Bid no
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_bidmgmt.escm_bidmgmt_id in (select escm_proposalmgmt.escm_bidmgmt_id from escm_proposalmgmt where escm_proposalmgmt.escm_proposalmgmt_id = @Escm_Proposalmgmt_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_PO_tax
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: valid_to_date::date > eut_convertto_gregorian(@em_escm_signaturedate@)::date or valid_to_date is null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_AgencyOrganization
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (em_ehcm_orgtyp is not null and em_ehcm_orgtyp in (select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where value ilike 'AGENCY') ) and ( (@Escm_isPRAvailable@='0' ) or((Escm_Org_V.Escm_Org_V_id in (select em_escm_agencyorg from escm_proposalmgmt_line line join escm_proposalsource_ref sourceref on sourceref.escm_proposalmgmt_line_id = line.escm_proposalmgmt_line_id join m_requisition req on req.m_requisition_id = sourceref.m_requisition_id where line.escm_proposalmgmt_id is not null and line.escm_proposalmgmt_id = @Escm_Proposalmgmt_ID@ ) ) or (Escm_Org_V.Escm_Org_V_id in(select em_escm_agencyorg from escm_bidmgmt_line line join escm_bidsourceref sourceref on sourceref.escm_bidmgmt_line_id = line.escm_bidmgmt_line_id join m_requisition req on req.m_requisition_id = sourceref.m_requisition_id where line.escm_bidmgmt_id is not null and line.escm_bidmgmt_id = @Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@))))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Custody transfer signature(line manager)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_User_ID <> @EM_Escm_Ctsender@ and AD_User_ID <> @EM_Escm_Ctreceiver@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_Org_dept
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_salesregion_id in (select c_salesregion_id from c_salesregion where ad_org_id = @AD_Org_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ForUserListingVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_user_id in (select distinct ad_user_id from ad_user_roles where isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Regulation_Document
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='RD' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Collect Bid Docuemnt Address
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='CBDA' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_SARegion_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_country_id in ( select c_country_id from c_country where countrycode ='SA')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_M_Inout_warehouse
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ( ((@EM_Escm_Receivingtype@ = 'SR' or @EM_Escm_Receivingtype@ = 'IR' or @EM_Escm_Receivingtype@ = 'INS') and em_escm_warehouse_type = 'REW' ) or ((@EM_Escm_Receivingtype@ = 'DEL' or @EM_Escm_Receivingtype@ = 'RET') and em_escm_warehouse_type = 'MAW') or ((@EM_Escm_Receivingtype@ = 'IRT' or @EM_Escm_Receivingtype@ = 'INR' or @EM_Escm_Receivingtype@ = 'LD') and em_escm_warehouse_type = 'RTW') ) and AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_CityBasedOnRegion
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_region_id = @C_Region_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Purchase order in PO
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_c_order_v.escm_c_order_v_id in (select maxvers.c_order_id from (select max(ord.em_escm_revision) as vers, ord.documentno from c_order ord ,(select max(em_escm_revision) as vers,documentno from c_order where ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@ and AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ and em_escm_appstatus='ESCM_AP' group by documentno) maxvers where ord.ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@ and ord.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@ and ord.em_escm_revision = maxvers.vers and ord.documentno=maxvers.documentno and docstatus ='CO' and em_escm_appstatus='ESCM_AP' and isactive='Y' group by ord.documentno )ord left join (select em_escm_revision,documentno,c_order_id from c_order where docstatus ='CO' and em_escm_appstatus='ESCM_AP' and isactive='Y' and ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@ and AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@)maxvers on ord.vers= maxvers.em_escm_revision and ord.documentno = maxvers.documentno) and (case when (@EM_Escm_Transtypevalue@!='PROJ' and @EM_Escm_Transtypevalue@!='RET') then escm_c_order_v.EM_Escm_Receivetype in ('QTY') when (@EM_Escm_Transtypevalue@='RET') then escm_c_order_v.EM_Escm_Receivetype in ('QTY','AMT') else escm_c_order_v.EM_Escm_Receivetype in ('QTY', 'AMT') end) and escm_c_order_v.escm_c_order_v_id in (select c_order_id from c_order o where ((o.EM_Escm_Contact_Type is not null and (case when (select count(ad_user_id) from eut_user_lookup_access where ad_user_id=@#AD_User_ID@)> 0 then o.EM_Escm_Contact_Type in (select escm_deflookups_typeln_id from eut_user_lookup_access where ad_user_id=@#AD_User_ID@ and isactive='Y') else o.EM_Escm_Contact_Type in (select escm_deflookups_typeln_id from eut_lookup_access where ad_role_id= @#AD_ROLE_ID@ and isactive='Y') end)) or(o.EM_Escm_Contact_Type is null ))) and escm_c_order_v.escm_c_order_v_id in ( select o1.c_order_id from c_order o1 where ((o1.EM_Escm_C_City_ID is not null and (case when (select count(ad_user_id) from EUT_User_Regandcity_Access where ad_user_id=@#AD_User_ID@)>0 then (o1.EM_Escm_C_City_ID IN (select c_city_id from EUT_User_Regandcity_Access where ad_user_id=@#AD_User_ID@ and c_city_id is not null ) or o1.EM_Escm_C_City_ID IN (select c_city_id from c_city where c_region_id in (select c_region_id from EUT_User_Regandcity_Access where ad_user_id=@#AD_User_ID@ and c_city_id is null )) ) else ((o1.EM_Escm_C_City_ID in (select eut_c_city_id from eut_regandcity_access cityacc where cityacc.ad_role_id =@#AD_ROLE_ID@ and cityacc.eut_c_city_id is not null )) or (o1.EM_Escm_C_City_ID in (select c_city_id from c_city where c_region_id in ( select eut_c_region_id from eut_regandcity_access cityacc1 where cityacc1.ad_role_id =@#AD_ROLE_ID@ and cityacc1.eut_c_city_id is null ) ))) end)) or (o1.EM_Escm_C_City_ID is null)))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: PO Second Supplier BranchName
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner_Location.C_BPartner_ID=@EM_Escm_Secondsupplier@ AND C_BPartner_Location.IsShipTo='Y' AND C_BPartner_Location.IsActive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_IC_Category_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='ICC' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Lookup reason Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@ReturnTransaction@ ='RT' and escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='RR' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Media Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='MT' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_TotPOChangeTypeLookUp
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='TPOCHGTYP' and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Second Supplier BranchName
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner_Location.C_BPartner_ID=@Secondsupplier@ AND C_BPartner_Location.IsShipTo='Y' AND C_BPartner_Location.IsActive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Suppliers
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((@escm_bidmgmt_id@ is not null and Escm_Bidsuppliers.escm_bidmgmt_id = @escm_bidmgmt_id@ ) or (@escm_bidmgmt_id@ is null and 1=1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_Proposal_Type_BasedOnRole
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Proposal Type Validation Based On Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.AD_Ref_List_id in (select ad_ref_list_id from eut_list_access where ad_role_id =@AD_Role_Id@ and isactive='Y' and ad_window_id='CAF2D3EEF3B241018C8F65E8F877B29F')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_ContactName_insu
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID in ( select C_BPartner_ID from ad_user where ad_user_id = @#AD_User_ID@) OR C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID in(select usr.c_bpartner_id from ad_preference pr join ad_user usr on usr.ad_user_id = pr.ad_user_id where property = 'ESCM_BGSpecialist_Role' and value='Y' and pr.ad_user_id is not null and pr.ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@) OR C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID in( select usr.c_bpartner_id from ad_preference pre join ad_user_roles rl on rl.ad_role_id = pre.visibleat_role_id join ad_user usr on usr.ad_user_id = rl.ad_user_id where property = 'ESCM_BGSpecialist_Role' and value='Y' and pre.ad_user_id is null and pre.visibleat_role_id is not null and pre.ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Bid Class
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='BC' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Open Envelope Address
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='CBDA' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Purchase order branch name
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: @C_Bpartner_ID@ is not null and c_bpartner_location.c_bpartner_id = @C_Bpartner_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: PR Document
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='PRRD' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Receiving Type (Issue Return,Return,Po Receipt)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((@IssueReturnTransaction@='IRT' and AD_Ref_List.value='IRT' ) or (@ReturnTransaction@='RT' and AD_Ref_List.value='INR' ) or (@LostandDamaged@='LD' and AD_Ref_List.value='LD') or (@ESCM_POReceipt@='PO' and AD_Ref_List.value not in ('IRT','INR','LD') )) and AD_Ref_List.AD_Ref_List_id in (select ad_ref_list_id from eut_list_access where ad_role_id =@AD_Role_Id@ and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Finanicial Year
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_year_id in (select y.c_year_id from c_period p join c_year y on y.c_year_id = p.c_year_id where now()::date between p.startdate and p.enddate and p.ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_PO_OrderTypeVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @EM_Escm_Ispurchaseagreement@='N'then value in ('PUR','CR') when @EM_Escm_Ispurchaseagreement@='Y'then value in ('PUR_AG','PUR_REL') end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Beneficary
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@em_Escm_btype@='S' and Escm_Beneficiary_V.btype=@em_Escm_btype@ and ( Escm_Beneficiary_V.ad_org_id=@AD_Org_ID@)) or(@em_Escm_btype@='D' and Escm_Beneficiary_V.btype=@em_Escm_btype@ ) or (@em_Escm_btype@='E' and Escm_Beneficiary_V.btype=@em_Escm_btype@ and Escm_Beneficiary_V.ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Committee Member Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='CMT' and isactive='Y') )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_bidline_v
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_bidmgmt_line_v.escm_bidmgmt_id = @Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Region based on city
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_region_id in (select c_region_id from c_city where c_city_id =@EM_Escm_C_City_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Supplier Number
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: em_efin_blacklist = 'N' and Vendor_BlocKing = 'N' and isvendor='Y' and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@ and (EM_Efin_Documentno<>'' or EM_Efin_Documentno is not null)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_PropContractCategoryLookUp
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when (select count(propln.escm_proposalmgmt_line_id) from escm_proposalmgmt_line propln where propln.escm_proposalmgmt_id=@ESCM_Proposalmgmt_ID@ and propln.m_product_id is not null)>0 then (escm_deflookups_typeln_id in (select pcontctg.contractcategory from escm_proposalmgmt_line propln left join m_product prod on prod.m_product_id=propln.m_product_id left join escm_prod_cont_catg pcontctg on prod.m_product_id=pcontctg.m_product_id where propln.escm_proposalmgmt_id=@ESCM_Proposalmgmt_ID@ and pcontctg.isactive='Y' and pcontctg.contractcategory is not null)) else (escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='POCONCATG' and isactive='Y')) end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Business Partner Certificate Name
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='CN' and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Escm_proposal_tax
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: valid_to_date::date > eut_convertto_gregorian(@effectivefrom@)::date or valid_to_date is null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ESCM_OEE_ContCategory
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: escm_deflookups_type_id in ( select escm_deflookups_type_id from escm_deflookups_type where reference ='POCONCATG' and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Committee(Proposal)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: type=(case when @aux_bidtype@='TR' OR @aux_bidtype@='LD' then 'TL' when @Escm_Bidmgmt_ID@ is null then 'DPC' else 'DPC' end) AND status='CO'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Proposal Status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (((@ESCM_ProposalStatus@='ANY') and AD_Ref_List.value IN ('AWD','SHO','DIS','WD')) or((@ESCM_ProposalStatus@='SHO' ) and AD_Ref_List.value IN ('AWD','CL','DIS','WD')) or((@ESCM_ProposalStatus@='AWD' ) and AD_Ref_List.value IN ('CL','DIS','WD')))
